name: Leafsticuffs
description:
Leafsticuffs is an arcade fighter-style doowacky made for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021. Players can use either game controllers or a keyboard!

Take on the role of Leaf, a beefy pile of leaves, whose rage is only rivaled by those who ejected him from the tree to die.

Currently there is only one enemy to fight - Stumps. Future battles are planned!

Let me know what you think! Thanks!

-Manbo
